mapper.insert: insert into wc_class (c_name, m_id, c_maxperson, c_addr1, c_addr2, c_addrdetails, c_lati, c_longi, c_level, c_time, c_category, c_content, c_img, c_price, c_confirm, c_regdate) values(#{c_name}, #{m_id}, #{c_maxperson}, #{c_addr1}, #{c_addr2}, #{c_addrdetails}, #{c_lati}, #{c_longi}, #{c_level}, #{c_time}, #{c_category}, #{c_content}, #{c_img}, #{c_price}, default, default)
insert into wc_timetable (t_start, t_end, t_date, t_rem_p, c_no) values (#{t_start}, #{t_end}, #{t_date}, #{t_rem_p}, #{c_no})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM wc_class WHERE c_category IN ( SELECT DISTINCT c_category FROM wc_class ) ORDER BY c_category
SELECT count(m_id) FROM wc_member WHERE DATE_FORMAT(m_dogbirth, '%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY), '%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%m-%d') and m_id=#{m_id};
